Këkht Aräkh.title: Dröm Sång
Këkht Aräkh.label: Sacred Bones Records
Këkht Aräkh.about:
“Dröm Sång," emerges as a poignant ballad, it blends melancholic melodies with an introspective narrative. Now available for pre-order, the new single will be available on 7-inch in two color variants, white and black, alongside the 2023 single "Wanderer."
Rooted in a draft originally conceived during the Pale Swordsman sessions in 2021, “Dröm Sång” carries a familiar resonance, particularly reminiscent of the track "Swordsman" from the same album. However, its creation followed an unconventional path, with recording taking place under spontaneous, often cramped conditions across Berlin, Germany, and Tokyo, Japan.
Despite its softer tone, "Dröm Sång" does not signal a departure from Këkht Aräkh’s black metal focus. The track remains a testament to the project's versatility, while staying true to its core ethos.
Këkht Aräkh.credits:
releases December 13, 2024
Crying Orc — everything
James Ginzburg —mixing / mastering

trackinfo.title: Dröm Sång
trackinfo.lyrics: Livet var ingenting mer än en dröm Livet var ingenting mer än en dröm Livet var ingenting mer än en dröm Livet var ingenting mer än en dröm Livet var ingenting Winds are blowing with no sound Everlasting winter all around        	   Flowers begging for the light Swordsman wandering in the night Nothing’s real as it may seem Sleep tight, life was but a dream Sorrow’s wearing out my heart Chased by shadows from the start Lies prevail, truth to be denied Swordsman wandering in the night Nothing’s real as it may seem Sleep tight, life was but a dream Lovers hiding under trees Darkness covers up their sins Wicked kingdom, there’s no love Darkness covers up its flaws Livet var ingenting mer än en dröm Livet var ingenting mer än en dröm Livet var ingenting mer än en dröm Livet var ingenting mer än en dröm Livet var ingenting
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

Këkht Aräkh.title: Night & Love
Këkht Aräkh.label: Sacred Bones Records
Këkht Aräkh.credits:
released December 1, 2019
Crying Orc — everything
Sam Brown — spoken word (Night, Love)

trackinfo.title: Elegy for the Memory of Me
trackinfo.lyrics: Never ending nighttime Through the present it flows I love the way it's staring on me By the stars that are so close Moonlight shivering on the water Reaching to the depths Silver light is touching all over Leaves me with no regrets Oh, my lovely moonlight Make me reminisce How gorgeous were these fields and forests When I was not exist Oh, my lovely darkness How much have we gone through Despite all pain you've caused to me I'm still in love with you Trees are growing older Crushing an eternity Years and years and years ago I Was buried and no longer live Never ending nighttime is Lighting up the moon Time flows fast Turns the memory of me into dust
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Den Venstre Hånd På Den Høyre
trackinfo.lyrics: Paradiset blir øynet oppe Jeg øyner Gud, som snill smiler Engler rekker deres hender til meg  Men det er for sent Lyset går vekk Det tette mørke etterlatende Jeg ønsker at jeg kunne på hans festen være med  Men jeg er ikke lenger i stand til det Her ligger jeg med kryssede hender  Den venstre hånd på den høyre  Mine leppene tigger ham videre  Det begeret meg å forbigå [translation] I see the heaven up above I see the God that's lovely smiling Angels land their hands But it's to late The light is moving away leaving behind pitch darkness I wish I could join its feast But I no longer able to I'm lying here with my arms crossed right hand on left one My lips keep begging him To let this cup pass me by
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Night
trackinfo.lyrics: Night Night is spreading her veil all over Sowing her seeds of sleep from up above Banished away from everywhere Sleep And dream away to where the sun no longer comes up Where a river flows slowly and once in a while glittering under a soft moonlight Where wind is barely blowing through A shivering foliage Where stars are shining brighter than ever Joining a silent feast No ray of light is able to pass through borders of the night No life bears to bother this quiet No life
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Her Body Strewn With Petals Black
trackinfo.lyrics: Garden flowers bloomed Caressing a glossy skin Bending upon beloved face Uttering no sound They ate the sky with wounded gaze Searching for the better one Shivering hands were born To extract the seed Spilled on the earth That saw gorgeous naked breast of Eve Blooming petals of black orchid flowers Fragile puppets of the wind of sorrow Gather them on (the) edge of time Deeping in the night For Eve is waiting for you come And left behind the fright Her body strewn with petals black Never been that beautiful The light no longer burning me down Smothered by the night The light of life was only lie The true love (has) just begun Love Quietly sleeping Motionless Trees Which are barely swinging in the wind Dropped their shadows On the heaving bellies Of sleeping bodies The night was beautiful here Forever
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Primal Beauty of Silence
trackinfo.lyrics: Bringing back to mountain cold, Biting frost of soundless fields Cutting up leftover breath (The) Silence (is) sowing its seeds Wading through the forest, touching fiber of the fog My lips (are) praising primal beauty without any words Suddenly she put her finger on my shivering mouth Licked by the moonlight, left me in a silence Suddenly she put her finger on my shivering mouth Licked by the moonlight, left me in a silence Bringing back to mountain cold, Biting frost of soundless fields Cutting up leftover breath (The) Silence sowed its seeds
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: As the Wounds Gently Bleed
trackinfo.lyrics: At the day I leave forever Take me across eternity At the day I suffer death Stay right next to me Love Tear me off my fears By agony and pain Close my eyes for good And spill all blood out of my veins Oh, I shall stand there beside you Do not despise me Tears running down my face As the wounds gently bleed The moon ascended to the sky Life no longer goes on Do embrace me in your arms And your forgiving bosom
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Love
trackinfo.lyrics: Love Spirit is arisen permeating every breath Love comes through We are all bonded here Just about to see how beautiful we are
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Down to the Depths of Inner Cold
trackinfo.lyrics: Down to the depths of inner cold Belowground kingdom The greatest of all on the ground Gabled mountains and the deepest snow Eternally preserve tranquility of inner cold Devoid of disease Devoid of hate and suffering The wisdom prophesies the everlasting peace With the arcane power it crushes the face of death Belowground kingdom The greatest of all on the ground Gabled mountains and the deepest snow Eternally preserve tranquility of inner cold
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Through Night Which Knows No Dawn
trackinfo.lyrics: [Verse1] At the night time, covered by darkness Slowly, she was walking near by the sea Castle droped shadows on her tiny contour (Which had) never known the quiet of eternity [Verse2] Pale feet of her, caressed by seawater (are) making their way towards the unknown Let me see the pain sheltered in your body Lingered through the night which knows no dawn [Outro] Castle in the night From now it was her own Out of reach for moonlight Of the night which knows no dawn
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Forever Night Castle of Love
trackinfo.lyrics: As the night falls You see the castle of love In the land where No longer sun shines from up above Night Night Falls and leaves No light Love Love Forever Night Castle of Love My soul is awaking from prolonged sleep I'm ready to join that silent feast Dancing away with an unconscious bliss We are all gathered by walls of the castle [Chorus] As we rose up our hands to the sky Showing our love to every star Our lives faded a long time ago In the world that we hated, where we never know Love
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: ...And Never Ends (Eternal Love)
trackinfo.lyrics: Love
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

Këkht Aräkh.title: Pale Swordsman
Këkht Aräkh.label: Sacred Bones Records
Këkht Aräkh.credits:
released April 10, 2021
Crying Orc — everything
Wanja Mamykin — mixing
Denis Volchenkov — lyrics for "Amid the Stars"

trackinfo.title: Thorns
trackinfo.lyrics: Rose petals white, covering the pavement Of my garden in the night, flowers faded Mirror keeps silent, can’t see my reflection Carefully reminds me of my imperfection Wounded by the thorns, painfully embracing The flowers that are meant to speak for me Love is left unspoken, love no longer matters Left unsheltered, trampled by eternity  Rose petals white, taken out by winds Cold and heavy, I hear winter sings Taken out by winds memories are gone She takes a rest under the tombstone Wounded by the thorns, hands are bleeding Blood is slowly dripping on the ground I can't feel the difference between death and living Everlasting winter all around Black skies eat the night No sound, no stars out Her hands are the same cold as mine But I'm forever cursed to be alive
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Night Descends
trackinfo.lyrics: Put me out of my misery Night descends, but I can not sleep Blood hunger is felt on my teeth Pictures of the past now torn to pieces So cold, feels freezing It’s the time of the night creatures Blade hurts less than my being Stab me in the heart with a sharp silver Wandering in the night, Pale Swordsman Seven blades, seven wounds Light pours casted by the full moon Let the thirst be quenched with a life Fade into my embrace Stepping into the void But the boundaries are yet far to cross Crystal-like eyes unclosed Night calls, I can hear the voice
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: In the Garden
trackinfo.lyrics: Would you follow me Would you ever share my fate If I walk away, I’ll be never back again Seven blades ran into my heart again Still the same, through the night I make my way Darkness over the garden Night reigns and the world suffers With hands pale like a marble Hold me close as a lover Eight ancient trees Hide me in your shadows I said a prayer thrice But there’s only silence Foliage whisper be heard And my sentence be told me To bleed for nothing, pretending That I deserve it Breathing the fragrance of night I long for the end For stars to light up black skies For a savior to lend me a hand Darkness over the garden Night reigns and the world suffers With hands pale like a marble Hold me close as a lover Wandering in the night, Pale Swordsman
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Amid the Stars
trackinfo.lyrics: Selfless gaze into the abyss  Shadows raging in my skull Fix me please, stop all these Thoughts that poisoning my soul Stars are getting dimmer Close my eyes so I can see Pale blue fire shimmers Rising sun is not for me Change is coming I can feel Rapture strengthening my will Time has come. Is someone Waiting for the freezing sun Void-like womb embraces us Fear is gone. Day is done Shadow's here. No need to run Lullabies for anyone
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Crystal
trackinfo.lyrics: Steel feels heavy in my grip Through the night I go, I can never sleep It’s my path, where my hunger leads me I can’t trust anything my eyes see Lights on, castle in the night Past the walls I hear someone inside Blood spills out of empty life My heart is being covered with a crystal ice Wounds hurt, the pain cannot be ceased Wounds hurt, as they gently bleed So cold, embraced by freezing winds Can only regret my atrocities She lays lifeless on my hands Mirrors show no signs of my presence No stars out on the black skies My tears are turning into a crystal ice This night is a nightmare Silence, darkness overwhelms, I’m blinded Far away from here, still hidden The castle of love, but I know how to find it Put my memories on fire Wipe away my tears and make me violent Crystal ice covers the entire world While she’s having a dream of a new world
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Swordsman
trackinfo.lyrics: The moon floats across the black skies No stars to be seen out tonight New life, what it feels like Snow falls, frozen tears hit the ground Winds whispering their secrets Wandering in the night, I keep them For you, I rid myself of evil Pale light gleams on my sword I cut the night as I’m going forward New life is what I long for Since I can’t bear my world anymore  Sorrow is my only feeling Through this everlasting season I’m going without any reason Winds whispering their secrets Wandering in the night, I keep them For you, I rid myself of evil Gathering the stars for you I rid myself of evil
trackinfo.label: Sacred Bones Records

trackinfo.title: Sorrow
trackinfo.lyrics: Ray of light falls on the road The wind keeps blowing, makes trees bowed I'm left around here with my fear of life ahead, so long, so blear Have no longer tears on my face Stepping forward, seeking for place That I saw in my dream while I slept Surrounded with darkness in the womb that I left Have no longer strength, my body diseased I feel the pain, I barely breathe Marking the end of this endless strip Fulfill my salvation through endless sleep Ray of light falls on the road The wind keeps blowing, makes trees bowed Dipping in darkness with no fear Out of this world, my mind is clear
trackinfo.about: Music and lyrics were done in the summer of 2018 by Crying Orc
trackinfo.credits:
from Through The Branches To Eternity, released December 6, 2018
Crying Orc

trackinfo.title: Through The Branches To Eternity
trackinfo.lyrics: Through the branches to the midnight sky  I let out my soul after exhale for the last time  Passing the branches, frozen and unkind.  I see it reflects a shell that I left behind.  Through the branches to eternity  I asked the wind to perform for me my last lullaby  Through the darkness keeping on my trip  Nothing awakes me and nothing will bother my dreamless sleep
trackinfo.credits:
from Through The Branches To Eternity, released December 6, 2018
Crying Orc

Këkht Aräkh.title: Between Eerly Howls of Wind
Këkht Aräkh.about:
This is an old track from pre-Këkht Aräkh era, when the project was named Yokai. The song was recorded in 2015 and released only 7 years after, on a compilation “Domains of the Deceased” by Livor Mortis.
The lyrics to the song were written by my friend, as my knowledge of English back then was too poor to write any. They were inspired by Japanese folklore and history.
Home-made, unintentionally raw and sloppy, with lyrics full of grammar and spelling mistakes — this is what the project was like in its early days.
The track is available on the major streaming platforms.
Këkht Aräkh.credits:
released December 27, 2022
Crying Orc — everything
V.S. — lyrics
Livor Mortis — cover art

Këkht Aräkh.title: Wanderer
Këkht Aräkh.label: Sacred Bones Records
Këkht Aräkh.about:
Drawing from personal experiences, the writing and recording process of 'Wanderer" was a nomadic journey in itself. Recording took place in two different locations - Berlin, Germany, and Espoo, Finland. Every borrowed guitar and impromptu studio session became a vital thread in the song's intricate tapestry.
Wanja from Mrtva Vod lent his raw drumming, Chase, the Galrög from Lore Liege, played a crucial role in shaping the song's brooding sound, and Nick from IC3PEAK provided a creative haven for the visceral vocal work. The eerie tranquility of the Finnish woods delivered the necessary space for Këkht Aräkh to breathe life into the song. Here, the finishing touches were added - the delicate keys and haunting vocals.
Këkht Aräkh.credits:
released November 29, 2023
Crying Orc — everything
Wanja Mamykin (Mrtva Vod) — drums
Galrog The Imperial (Lore Liege) — mixing / mastering
